item.author: i-get-it-now-what@solidgold.co.za (Vuuma Collaborations | Solid Gold Podcasts)
item.itunes:author: Vuuma Collaborations | Solid Gold Podcasts
item.title: How to enable innovation while maintaining process and structure | Sarandos Gouvelis (De Beers | Innovation Capability Lead)
item.itunes:title: How to enable innovation while maintaining process and structure | Sarandos Gouvelis (De Beers | Innovation Capability Lead)
item.itunes:subtitle: A conversation journey into what underpins excellence in innovation
item.description:
How to enable innovation while maintaining process and structure — A conversation journey into what underpins excellence in innovation Sarandos Gouvelis (De Beers | Innovation Capability Lead) It's an age old battle, the dance between structured process and innovation practice, and it's won on the grounds of balance. In this podcast we discuss innovation with Sarandos Gouvelis, innovation capability lead at De Beers, the worlds leading diamond company. We speak about how innovation is a 'both-and', not an 'either-or.' Innovation isn't just about great ideas but great ideas that you can capitalize on. Innovative organisations are underpinned by understanding the need for freedom in the process but structure in the freedom. Join us as we dig deep and make business personal.


Vuuma Collaborations website http://vuuma.com/

Vuuma Collaborations training company website http://simine.co/

Sarandos Gouvelis LinkedIn page https://www.linkedin.com/in/sarandos-gouvelis-b3760823/?originalSubdomain=za


Visit our website for more information on Sytems Thinking http://vuuma.com/


When you're ready to #BeHeard, contact the podcast specialists at SolidGold.co.za

item.itunes:author: Vuuma Collaborations | Solid Gold Podcasts
item.title: How to keep your business on the race track | Jurriaan Kamer (Author, Speaker, Change Agent and Organizational Designer)
item.itunes:title: How to keep your business on the race track | Jurriaan Kamer (Author, Speaker, Change Agent and Organizational Designer)
item.itunes:subtitle: What Formula One has to say about organizational performance
item.description:
How to keep your business on the race track — What Formula One has to say about organizational performance Jurriaan Kamer (Author, Speaker, Change Agent and Organizational Designer) In this episode Jurriaan Kamer the author of FormulaX speaks with Gary Lane, one of the founding partners of Vuuma Collaborations and Antony Mello, a senior consultant at Vuuma about a few of the key concepts that business can and should learn from Formula 1. We talk innovation, speed and what organizations should be focusing on given the fast paced nature of the world we live in today.


Vuuma Collaborations company website http://vuuma.com

Vuuma Collaborations training company (SiMINE) website http://simine.co

Jurriaan Kamer LinkedIn profile https://nl.linkedin.com/in/jurriaankamer


Visit our website for more information on Sytems Thinking http://vuuma.com/


When you're ready to #BeHeard, contact the podcast specialists at SolidGold.co.za
